sentences.en: Be sure to store them carefully as they bruise easily.
sentences.cn: 小心存放，因为它们很容易被碰伤。

sentences.en: Crops can be all too easily decimated by unchecked depredations by deer.
sentences.cn: 任由鹿糟蹋会很容易把庄稼都毁了。

sentences.en: Global ecological efforts can easily be at odds with local ecologies.
sentences.cn: 全球性生态保护工作很可能会和地方生态系统存在矛盾。

sentences.en: He easily overcame Garcia, Saturday's conqueror of Ernie Els.
sentences.cn: 他轻松战胜了星期六击败厄尼·埃尔斯的加西亚。

sentences.en: He would see I was not so easily replaceable.
sentences.cn: 他会看到我不是那么容易被替代的。

sentences.en: I'm forever on a diet, since I put on weight easily.
sentences.cn: 我永远都在减肥，因为我很容易长胖。

sentences.en: It is crucial that all documents presented are authentic and easily verifiable.
sentences.cn: 所有提交的文件必须真实且易于查证，这一点很关键。

sentences.en: Lorenzo was a natural leader who made friends easily.
sentences.cn: 洛伦佐是天生的领袖，善于交友。

sentences.en: Neat solutions are not easily found to these issues.
sentences.cn: 很难找到解决这些问题的巧妙办法。

sentences.en: Often a patient cannot snap out of their negativity that easily.
sentences.cn: 病人常常不能那么容易就打消掉消极的情绪。

sentences.en: She could have established her own innocence and virtue easily enough.
sentences.cn: 她本可以轻易地证实自己纯真善良的品性。

sentences.en: The plaintiff's sole witness, a gambler and layabout, was easily discredited.
sentences.cn: 原告唯一的证人嗜赌成性，游手好闲，其证词一下子就被推翻了。

sentences.en: The stove is on wheels so it can be shuffled around easily.
sentences.cn: 这个炉子底下带轮子，很容易四处移动。

sentences.en: They talked amiably and easily about a range of topics.
sentences.cn: 他们友好而随意地谈论各种话题。

sentences.en: Watch them carefully as they finish cooking because they can burn easily.
sentences.cn: 就要做好时得小心看着，因为它们很容易烧糊。

sentences.en: We found the house easily enough.
sentences.cn: 我们轻轻松松就找到了房子。
